name: Priority List
description:
Controls:

Left Click/Right Click To Swing

Shift to Run

Space to Jump

Navigate Sergio through the world by selecting only 2 out of the 3 options he has to counter the threats of the unknown.

Asssets borrowed:

Music:

Eric Skiff - HHavok-intro https://ericskiff.com/music/

Eric Skiff - HHavok-main https://ericskiff.com/music/

Fonts:

https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font

https://www.dafont.com/green-screen.font?text=green+screen

All art, programming, sound effects were done by Joey Schmidt.

Created as an unofficial entry to the Illinois State University January 2021 Game Jam. It will not be ranked because I helped create the jam and already had knowledge of the theme.

https://itch.io/jam/the-illinois-state-january-2021-game-jam
